column2: REFILE-Gannett still waiting for Tribune Publishing shareholder vote-sourceGannett still waiting for Tribune Publishing shareholder vote: sourceUPDATE 3-Gannett takes heart from Tribune Publishing shareholder vote June 2 Gannett Co Inc seized on a vote on board director nominees by Tribune Publishing Co  shareholders on Thursday to claim that the publisher of the Los Angeles Times and Chicago Tribune should engage with it in acquisition talks.  UPDATE 3-Gannett takes heart from Tribune Publishing shareholder vote June 2 Gannett Co Inc seized on a vote on board director nominees by Tribune Publishing Co  shareholders on Thursday to claim that the publisher of the Los Angeles Times and Chicago Tribune should engage with it in acquisition talks. Gannett Co Inc  is waiting for Tribune Publishing Co's  shareholders to vote on the company's board director nominees later on Thursday before making any decision about dropping its bid
